messages.subject: Swedish TV program looking for hsers
messages.msgSnippet: I m sending to this list because I think it would be very nice to introduce Sweden to the unschooling side of homeschooling, if possible. -pam This one needs a
messages.messageBody:
I'm sending to this list because I think it would be very nice to
introduce Sweden to the unschooling side of homeschooling, if possible.

-pam


This one needs a fast response:

A Swedish television program is doing a spot on homeschooling. They
are interested in visiting and interviewing a homeschooling family
with 3 or more kids interested in appearing on camera. A reporter
and cameraman would spend 30 to 45 minutes with the family and is
interested in their reasons for homeschooling, opinion of public
schools, and what type of activities they do.

If you are in the DC region (Northern Virginia, Maryland) and would
be interested in being interviewed for Swedish television (where
homeschooling is a new concept to the mainstream population), please
call Alexa immediately at (703) 577-2812

Summary:

Who: homeschooling family, preferably 3 or more kids
What: Interview for Swedish television with on-camera appearance
Where: DC region (Northern Virginia, Maryland) At home of family
being interviewed
When: ASAP, would like to arrange for Tuesday 3/30/2004, or
Wednesday 3/31/2004 interview and program will likely air on
Saturday.

Contact: Alexa, 703 577-3812

Thanks,

Billy
www.unschooling.org
www.FUN-Books.com

Please feel free to distribute this to any homeschoolers you feel
might be interested in this opportunity, but be sure to copy the
entire message so they have all the information. Please do not
distribute after 3/31/04.
